long_description: The men's short Sultana Pants from Mammut stand up to your climbing and backpacking forays thanks to durable, stretchy and breathable soft-shell fabric. Mammut SOFtech(TM) soft-shell fabric is highly weather resistant. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Strong, welded belt loops are very low profile for comfort under a pack or harness; dual-snap closure secures the front. Open hand pockets and rear zippered pocket are lined with stretch-mesh. Welded, zippered thigh pocket stashes items you need to keep handy. Mammut Sultana Pants for men feature drawcord hems to seal out the weather.
short_description: The men's short Sultana Pants from Mammut stand up to your climbing and backpacking forays thanks to durable, stretchy and breathable soft-shell fabric.
